app.CreateBluetoothList: Returns a new BluetoothList object with selectable list of paired and discovered Bluetooth devices
app.CreateCameraView: Returns a new CameraView object to access the device camera
app.CreateCrypt: Returns a new Crypt object to encrypt or decrypt a string with a given key or create a hash of it
app.CreateDialog: Returns a new Dialog object to display messages
app.CreateEmail: Returns an Email object for user to send emails
app.CreateGameView: The GameView is a blindingly fast container for game development with a physics engine and PIXI as underlying sprite container which uses the GPU to render graphics
app.CreateNode: Creates a NodeJS background process with all the functionality of common node.js
app.CreateSMS: Returns a new SMS object to send and retreive SMS messages
app.CreateWizard: The wizard is supposed to simplify a configuration progress which requires several inputs and decisions by the user
app.OpenDatabase: OpenDatabase creates or opens a local database in which large amounts of data can be stored that can still be queried in a reasonable amount of time

If the device has sent the connection request
	name is of type boolean (true if the connection was established successful)
	and address is your BluetoothSerial object

if the device has received the connection request
	name is a string with the clients bluetooth name
	and address includes the bluetooth address
